EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Is it really March? Believe it or not, we’ve rolled into March 2021. We hope our friends in the Texas area are recovering from a very tough few weeks, and to those of you in other regions who have experienced severe cold weather, hang in there – the spring thaw is right around the corner. We’ve learned a lot this past year about perseverance, adaptability and remained united as we walked through tough times together. As the COVID vaccine continues to rollout and travel restrictions loosen, we are looking forward to greeting each of you in person. Until then, we hope you remain in good health and remember we’re here to help.

PRODUCT SPOTLIGHT
BendixKing AeroCruze 230 The BendixKing AeroCruze 230 (KFC 230) is now certified to support upgrades of the KFC 200. Get advanced features and improved performance out of your already great KFC 200 autopilot. AeroCruze 230, when interfaced to digital sensors, provides safety enhancing features like Level Mode as a touchscreen controller that enables augmented mode information. For details, visit this page <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/ai/autopilots-and-indicators/aerocruze-230?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_bendixking&utm_content=dealer+nl+ac230]]>.
